EmailTemplate.subject: Stay Mission Ready with UH-60 Upgrades
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
S3 International brings you the -10 ATS Upgrade for the UH-60
Honeywell is proud to be a significant content provider for the UH-60 and together with Honeywell Authorized Distributor S3 International, we are providing highly reliable solutions.
The UH-60 -10 Air Turbine Starter (ATS) upgrade with S3 International provides faster main engine starts, greater reliability and longer life-cycle operations and maintenance costs.
S3 International keeps you flying by creating value-added solutions through superior customer support, uncompromising quality and technical innovation with upgrades like the Dash-10 ATS. With this upgrade, you can expect:
- Up to 14% increased light-off torque - Quick drain oil valve allowing for oil drainage without removal of starter - ATS reliability MTBF >4000 hours
Contact S3 International to learn more about this upgrade today!
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/S3-UH60.html?utm_medium=Email&utm_source=Email&utm_campaign=18_channelamericas_D&S]]>
Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to subscribe to our email communications.
